verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
How my soul longs for You
Longs to worship You forever
In Your power and majesty

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Lift my hands lift my heart
Lift my voice
Towards the heavens
For You are my
Sun and shield

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hear these praises
From a grateful heart
Each time I think of You
The praises start
Love You so much Jesus
Love You so much

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord I love You
My soul sings
In Your presence
Carried on Your wings
Love You so much Jesus
Love You so much
